movies.title: Star Trek
movies.actors: Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Leonard Nimoy, Eric Bana
movies.plot: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful Romulan from the future creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
movies.actors: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Peter Cushing
movies.plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
movies.actors: Harrison Ford, Mark Hamill, Carrie Fisher, Adam Driver
movies.plot: Three decades after the Empire's defeat, a new threat arises in the militant First Order. Defected stormtrooper Finn and the scavenger Rey are caught up in the Resistance's search for the missing Luke Skywalker.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.actors: Alan Howard, Noel Appleby, Sean Astin, Sala Baker
movies.plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.actors: Noel Appleby, Ali Astin, Sean Astin, David Aston
movies.plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

movies.title: Lord of the Flies
movies.actors: James Aubrey, Tom Chapin, Hugh Edwards, Roger Elwin
movies.plot: Lost on an island, young survivors of a plane crash eventually revert to savagery despite the few rational boys' attempts to prevent that.

movies.title: Something the Lord Made
movies.actors: Alan Rickman, Yasiin Bey, Kyra Sedgwick, Gabrielle Union
movies.plot: A dramatization of the relationship between heart surgery pioneers Alfred Blalock and Vivien Thomas.

movies.title: National Lampoon's Animal House
movies.actors: Tom Hulce, Stephen Furst, Mark Metcalf, Mary Louise Weller
movies.plot: At a 1962 college, Dean Vernon Wormer is determined to expel the entire Delta Tau Chi Fraternity, but those troublemakers have other plans for him.

movies.title: Men at Work
movies.actors: Danny Masterson, Michael Cassidy, Adam Busch, James Lesure
movies.plot: Comedy following the misadventures of four buddies who work together at a magazine.

movies.title: Weird Science
movies.actors: Anthony Michael Hall, Kelly LeBrock, Ilan Mitchell-Smith, Bill Paxton
movies.plot: Two high school nerds use a computer program to literally create the perfect woman, but she turns their lives upside down.

movies.title: Bedazzled
movies.actors: Brendan Fraser, Elizabeth Hurley, Frances O'Connor, Miriam Shor
movies.plot: Hopeless dweeb Elliot Richards is granted seven wishes by the Devil to snare Allison, the girl of his dreams, in exchange for his soul.

movies.title: Friday the 13th
movies.actors: Betsy Palmer, Adrienne King, Jeannine Taylor, Robbi Morgan
movies.plot: A group of camp counselors are stalked and murdered by an unknown assailant while trying to reopen a summer camp where, years before, it was the site of a child's drowning and a grisly double murder.

movies.title: Friday the 13th: Part 2
movies.actors: Amy Steel, John Furey, Adrienne King, Kirsten Baker
movies.plot: Mrs. Voorhees is dead, and Camp Crystal Lake is shut down, but a camp next to the infamous place is stalked by an unknown assailant.

movies.title: Friday the 13th Part III
movies.actors: Terry Ballard, Richard Brooker, Gloria Charles, Rachel Howard
movies.plot: Having revived from his wounds, Jason Voorhees takes refuge at a cabin near Crystal Lake. As a group of co-eds arrive for their vacation, Jason continues his killing spree.

movies.title: Friday the 13th: The Final Chapter
movies.actors: Judie Aronson, Peter Barton, Erich Anderson, Kimberly Beck
movies.plot: After being mortally wounded and taken to the morgue, murderer Jason Voorhees spontaneously revives and embarks on a killing spree as he makes his way back to his home at Camp Crystal Lake.
